src: La ragazza aveva inviato al ragazzo un biglietto di S. Valentino.
mt: The girl had sent the boy a Valentine's Day card.
ref: The girl had sent the boy a Valentine's Day.

src: Annuii all'affermazione del mio amico.
mt: I agreed with my friend's statement.
ref: I nodded at my friend's statement.

src: Gli amici lanciarono una moneta.
mt: Friends tossed a coin.
ref: Friends tossed a coin.

src: Il timer aveva suonato in cucina.
mt: The timer went off in the kitchen.
ref: The timer had gone off in the kitchen.

src: La donna stabilì un obiettivo ambizioso.
mt: The woman set an ambitious goal.
ref: The woman set an ambitious goal.

src: L'uomo ricco morì di vecchiaia.
mt: The rich man died of old age.
ref: The rich man died of old age.

src: La donna calpestò le fiamme.
mt: The woman stepped on the flames.
ref: The woman stepped on the flames.

src: La macchina della donna era dal meccanico.
mt: The woman's car was at the mechanic.
ref: The woman's car was at the mechanic.

src: Mi riaddormentai dopo la sveglia.
mt: I woke up after the alarm.
ref: I fell asleep again after waking up.

src: La figura pubblica uscì dalla limousine.
mt: The public figure exited the limousine.
ref: The public figure stepped out of the limo.

src: La donna si trattenne nella vasca.
mt: The woman stayed in the tub.
ref: The woman lingered in the tub.

src: Lo studente universitario voleva incontrare altri studenti nel campus.
mt: The university student wanted to meet other students on campus.
ref: The college student wanted to meet other students on campus.

src: Sollevai i cuscini del divano.
mt: Lift the cushions of the sofa.
ref: I lifted the sofa cushions.

src: La vespa volò verso il ragazzo.
mt: The wasp flew towards the boy.
ref: The wasp flew towards the boy.

src: La donna fu incriminata per un reato minore.
mt: The woman was charged with a minor offense.
ref: The woman was charged with a minor offense.

src: Mischiai dello zucchero nel tè caldo.
mt: Stir sugar into hot tea.
ref: I mixed some sugar into the hot tea.

src: Il veterano camminava zoppo.
mt: The veteran walked with a limp.
ref: The veteran walked lame.

src: Il criminale sfuggì alla polizia.
mt: The criminal escaped the police.
ref: The criminal escaped the police.

src: Il laptop non si accendeva.
mt: The laptop wouldn't turn on.
ref: The laptop did not turn on.

src: La donna esaurì lo spazio nel suo armadio.
mt: The woman exhausted the space in her closet.
ref: The woman ran out of space in her closet.

src: L'uomo aveva il cuore spezzato.
mt: The man was heartbroken.
ref: The man was heartbroken.

src: L'uomo ottenne un diploma.
mt: The man got a diploma.
ref: The man got a diploma.

src: La voce dell'uomo si diffuse chiaramente per l'intero auditorio.
mt: The man's voice was clearly audible throughout the auditorium.
ref: The man's voice spread clearly throughout the entire audience.

src: Gettai una moneta nell'acqua della fontana.
mt: I threw a coin into the fountain.
ref: I threw a coin into the water of the fountain.

src: Il giocatore colpì la palla verso la buca.
mt: The player hit the ball towards the hole.
ref: The player hit the ball towards the hole.

src: Inspirai la polvere in mansarda.
mt: I breathed in the dust in the attic.
ref: I inhaled the dust in the attic.

src: Il cassiere del negozio chiamò la sicurezza.
mt: The cashier called security.
ref: The store cashier called security.

src: Portai fuori la spazzatura.
mt: I took out the trash.
ref: I took out the garbage.

src: La famiglia andò allo zoo.
mt: The family went to the zoo.
ref: The family went to the zoo.

src: Il respiro dell'uomo era affannoso.
mt: The man was breathing heavily.
ref: The man's breathing was heavy.

src: Avevo un biglietto in più per il concerto.
mt: I had an extra ticket for the concert.

src: Il condizionatore dentro casa si era rotto.
mt: The air conditioner inside the house broke.
ref: The air conditioner inside the house had broken.

src: Al ragazzo doleva la schiena.
mt: The boy had back pain.
ref: The boy's back ached.

src: Comprai un regalo a mia madre.
mt: I bought a gift for my mother.
ref: I bought my mother a gift.

src: I narcisi nel giardino erano stati distrutti.
mt: The narcissi in the garden had been destroyed.
ref: The daffodils in the garden had been destroyed.

src: Strofinai il fiammifero.
mt: Rub the match.
ref: I struck the match.

src: Le parti della controversia raggiunsero un'intesa.
mt: The parties to the dispute reached an agreement.

src: I bambini furono mandati in orfanotrofio.
mt: The children were sent to an orphanage.

mt: The meteorite landed in the ocean.

src: L'escursionista incontrò un serpente velenoso.
mt: The hiker encountered a venomous snake.

src: Il forno diventò bollente.
mt: The oven became hot.

src: Spremetti lo spicchio di limone.
mt: Squeeze the lemon wedge.
ref: Squeeze the lemon wedge.

src: La nazione scoprì un nuovo territorio.
mt: The nation discovered a new territory.

src: Il bicchiere si rovesciò dal tavolo.
mt: The glass fell off the table.
ref: The glass fell off the table.

src: Il tavolo oscillava.
mt: The table was wobbling.
ref: The table swayed.

src: Il padre colse il figlio a mentire.
mt: The father caught the son in a lie.

src: La testa dell'uomo pulsava di dolore.
mt: The man's head throbbed with pain.

mt: The train slowed down.

src: L'uomo passò attraverso una terapia.
mt: The man underwent therapy.

mt: The woman grabbed her throat.

src: La donna aveva la gola infiammata.
mt: The woman had a sore throat.

src: Il cane adocchiò la bistecca succulenta in tavola.
mt: The dog spotted the succulent steak on the table.

src: Gli affari della donna avevano successo.
mt: The woman's business was successful.

src: Gli studenti uscirono dalla classe.
mt: The students left the classroom.

src: La donna sosteneva di aver visto un fantasma.
mt: The woman claimed to have seen a ghost.
ref: The woman claimed to have seen a ghost.

src: L'uomo perse il suo udito.
mt: The man lost his hearing.
ref: The man lost his hearing.

src: Il bambino lasciò andare il filo del palloncino.
mt: The child let go of the balloon string.

src: L'uomo perse l'abilità di parlare.
mt: The man lost the ability to speak.

src: La donna inciampò sul marciapiede.
mt: The woman tripped on the sidewalk.

mt: Taken antibiotics.

mt: The traffic light turned yellow.

src: Il contenitore di plastica si sciolse.
mt: The plastic container melted.

src: La macchina si era ammaccata.
mt: The vehicle had been damaged.

src: Il ragazzo studiò tutta la notte.
mt: The boy studied all night.

src: Il ragazzino si avvinghiò al bordo piscina.
mt: The boy clung to the edge of the pool.

src: Misi la mano sul petto.
mt: Put your hand on your chest.

src: L'edificio adiacente al mio ufficio era in costruzione.
mt: The building next to my office was under construction.

src: La famiglia voleva conoscere i loro nuovi vicini.
mt: The family wanted to know their new neighbors.

src: Dell'acqua schizzò fuori dalla piscina.
mt: Water splashed out of the pool.

src: Mangiai una fetta di anguria.
mt: 1. Eat a slice of watermelon.

mt: The boy tripped.

mt: The woman put on the headphones.

src: Riempii la mia bottiglia d'acqua.
mt: Fill my water bottle.

mt: The television show was censored.

mt: The ship sank.

src: Il ragazzo era perplesso circa l'indovinello.
mt: The boy was perplexed about the riddle.

src: Il telefono squillò.
mt: The phone rang.

src: La donna mi stava fissando.
mt: The woman was staring at me.

src: Il gruppo se ne andò dal museo.
mt: The group left the museum.
ref: The group left the museum.

src: L'uomo inizò a litigare con me.
mt: The man started to argue with me.

src: La gomma della mia bici era a terra.
mt: My bike's tire was on the ground.

mt: The girl appeared pale.
ref: The girl looked pale.

src: La penna aveva finito l'inchiostro.
mt: The pen ran out of ink.

src: All'uomo fu rifiutato un prestito.
mt: He was refused a loan.

src: La ragazze restò a casa da scuola.
mt: The girl stayed home from school.
ref: The girl stayed home from school.

src: Il cestino dell'immondizia era pieno.
mt: The trash can was full.
ref: The garbage can was full.

src: Passai l'aspirapolvere sul tappeto.
mt: I vacuumed the carpet.

src: L'uomo andò su tutte le furie.
mt: The man flew into a rage.

src: La ragazza lanciò un ramoscello nel falò.
mt: The girl threw a twig into the fire.

mt: The man got out of the shower.

src: I genitori volevano che i loro figli andassero all'università.
mt: The parents wanted their children to go to university.

mt: The man unlaced his shoes.

src: L'uomo mangiò metà del primo.
mt: 1. The man ate half of the first one.

src: La mia caviglia era gonfia.
mt: My ankle was swollen.

src: La porta del mio ufficio era aperta.
mt: My office door was open.
ref: The door to my office was open.

src: Dovevo aspettare in fila.
mt: I had to wait in line.

src: L'uomo schiacciò la mosca.
mt: The man squashed the fly.
ref: The man swatted the fly.

src: L'uomo scrisse un testamento.
mt: The man wrote a will.
ref: The man wrote a will.

mt: The runner noticed his rival was gaining on him.

src: Riflettei sul problema con cura.
mt: I reflected on the problem carefully.
ref: I thought about the problem carefully.

mt: The traveler walked on the wobbly suspension bridge.

src: L'uomo aveva previsto la vittoria della squadra.
mt: The man had predicted the team's victory.

src: Il ragazzo non riusciva ad addormentarsi.
mt: The boy couldn't fall asleep.
ref: The boy could not fall asleep.
